name: AddOnSkins

name: AlysiaUI_Classic
summary: clean and modern UI with Tank/DPS and Heal Layout. transparent and Classcolor Themes are available.

summary: BenikUI is an external ElvUI Classic mod, adding different frame style and new features like detatched portraits and dashboards.

summary: Addon Pack for Raids

name: CodeNameBlaze
summary: An external edit of ElvUI

name: Custom Tags
summary: A collection of custom unitframe tags requested by users.

name: DSM Classic
summary: Small collection of shared media to insert to Elvui or any other UI that supports SharedMedia for Classic.

name: ElvUI
summary: A USER INTERFACE DESIGNED AROUND USER-FRIENDLINESS WITH EXTRA FEATURES THAT ARE NOT INCLUDED IN THE STANDARD UI.

name: ElvUI EasyBuff
summary: Monitor and reapply Buffs to yourself and your raid with a simple mouse wheel scroll!  (NEW) Automatically remove unwanted buffs too!

name: ElvUI Nuts and Bolts Classic
summary: A compilation of useful mini addons.

name: ElvUI Progressive Colored DataBars
summary: Colorize and customize ElvUI Classic's DataBars

name: ElvUI PVP Data Text
summary: Create a data text to display PVP information

name: ElvUI TauntAlert
summary: Simple taunt notification plugin.  Configure display and sounds for taunt events.

name: ElvUI UnitFramePlugin
summary: Plugin to make your health/power frame transparent.

name: ElvUI_mMediaTagClassic
summary: Statusbar Textur, Tags and Datatext

name: ElvUI_QuestXP_Classic
summary: Adds an overlay to the XP bar to show how much Quest XP is in your quest log.

name: Gathering Classic
summary: Display per-hour gathering rates of items in a clean tooltip

name: GennUI Classic
summary: A clean minimalistic edit for ElvUI.

name: LocationPlus Classic for ElvUI
summary: Adds player location, coords + 2 Datatexts and a tooltip with info based on player location/level.

name: Masque: Epix
summary: Masque Skin for the ever popular addon Masque.

name: MaxUI Classic
summary: MaxUI Classic is an external edit for Tukui Classic and World of Warcraft Classic.

name: MerathilisUI-Classic
summary: ElvUI_MerathilisUI is an external ElvUI Mod. Mostly for the design in a transparent look with a few additional features.

name: MOGUI: Classic Edition
summary: MOGUI is a project of my own design, it is made for all classes and roles.

name: Neat Minimap
summary: Hide buttons and clutter when not mousing over the minimap

summary: PatUI Classic is an external edit for Tukui Classic that changes the style of default Tukui.

name: ProjectAzilroka
summary: ProjectAzilroka

name: RedtuzkUI Classic
summary: RedtuzkUI Classic is a clean and functional external edit for ElvUI.

name: Tukui
summary: A clean, lightweight, minimalist and popular user interface among the warcraft community since 2007.

name: Tukui Ammo Data Text
summary: Create a data text to display ammo count

name: Tukui Custom Action Bar Layout
summary: This is an addon for Tukui that allows defining a custom layout for the action bars.

name: Tukui Nameplate Features Classic
summary: Extra nameplate features like scaling, alpha settings, threat options.

name: Tukui PVP Data Text
summary: Create a data text to display PVP information

name: Tukui Server Time Data Text
summary: Shows the server time, along with a tooltip that shows both server and local time, when hovered. Respects the 24-hour setting from Tukui.

name: Tukui Tracking Menu
summary: This addon adds a drop-down menu to the tracking icon, allowing you to select what to track.

name: Tukui_Microbar
summary: microbar for Tukui

name: vUI Classic
summary: A visual interface replacement. It restyles the default interface, while adding many useful features.
